alert.note: Alert for Beauregard; Calcasieu; Jefferson Davis (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 7:01PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Jefferson Davis, south central Beauregard and central Calcasieu Parishes through 730 PM CDT... At 700 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Gillis, or near Moss Bluff moving south at 40 mph. Other strong storms were located near De Quincy HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake Charles, Sulphur, Westlake, Welsh, Iowa, Moss Bluff, De Quincy, Ragley, Buller, Buhler, Topsy, Lebleu Settlement, Gillis, Carlyss and Lacassine. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 19 and 56. Interstate 210 between mile markers 1 and 2, and between mile markers 11 and 12. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
